column1: Little Goat Diner////This is my new favorite restaurant in the Fulton Market District! We had reservations and were seated within 5 minutes of arrival. Before being seated I enjoyed the cute custom little goat photo booth! The waitress was friendly and offered some great recommendations and we decided to order the jerk chicken sandwich
column3: and the Mac n cheese. I highly suggest trying the machos nachos! The chips were crispy and the cheese on it is addicting. Great upscale diner and the prices aren't bad! Perfect for a casual date.
